seo.title: Services | SustainSage
seo.description: Explore SustainSage coaching packages for transitions, confidence and ethical experiments.

hero.title: Three coaching pathways, one steady partnership
hero.subtitle: Every package is grounded in ICF ethics. You hold authorship; we co-design experiments that respect your pace and context.

overview.title: How we work across all packages
overview.subtitle: Coaching with SustainSage is for thoughtful experimentation, not emergency support. We honour nuance, culture and capacity.
overview.description: We begin with a 20-minute intro call to confirm scope, consent, accessibility needs and whether coaching is right for now.
bullets: ICF-aligned coaching with written agreements, confidentiality and clear pricing.
Sessions are held online unless we both plan otherwise in advance.
You choose the agenda each time; we bring structure, reflection and accountability.
We pause and signpost if therapy, legal or medical support would serve you better.

boundary.title: Boundaries we uphold
boundary.body: You stay responsible for decisions and follow-up actions. We will name when another professional or resource is a better fit.
bullets: No immigration, legal, financial or medical advice.
No promises of jobs, visas or guaranteed outcomes.
We do not act on your behalf or intervene in your organisation.

packages.title: Choose the pathway you need right now
packages.description: Each card opens a detailed page with who it serves, the step-by-step flow, boundaries and composite case studies.

cards.title: Transition package
cards.summary: Six sessions when relocation or role change feels like carrying two lives at once.
cards.for: Steady change for people navigating new cities, roles or return-to-work
cards.focus: Clarify what a ‘good move’ means, design grounded experiments and close loose threads.

cards.title: Reset package
cards.summary: Four sessions to rebuild rhythms after depletion or an intense life season.
cards.for: Restore capacity for carers, returners and leaders emerging from burnout
cards.focus: Audit commitments, test gentle boundaries and document a sustainable baseline.

cards.title: Deepening package
cards.summary: Eight sessions to integrate leadership, equity and presence with more nuance.
cards.for: Longer arc for multicultural leaders, founders and space-holders
cards.focus: Explore power, practise difficult conversations and embed learning in daily work.

learn.title: New to coaching?
learn.summary: Visit the explainer to see what happens in sessions, how we hold boundaries and how coaching differs from mentoring or therapy.

process.title: How we begin
process.description: A shared rhythm keeps you informed without overloading you with admin.
bullets: Intro call: confirm the fit, accessibility needs and whether coaching is the right support.
Agreement: outline cadence, language preferences and between-session support.
Regular reviews: notice progress, adjust pace or close the engagement with intention.

faq.title: Questions before you decide
faq.intro: We gathered common questions about scope, ethics and logistics. Read the full FAQ for more context.

cta.title: Need help choosing?
cta.body: Share a few lines about what’s happening. We’ll suggest a starting point or signpost other support.
cta.primaryAria: Book a 20-minute intro call with SustainSage
